scripts.reset: cd $npm_package_config_theme_path && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint:js: ./node_modules/.bin/jslint $npm_package_config_theme_js_path > errors_js.log; echo 'Done. Look at errors_js.log'; exit 0;
scripts.lint:css: ./node_modules/.bin/stylelint $npm_package_config_theme_sass_path -q --fix --config $npm_package_config_stylelintrc_file > errors_css.log; echo 'Done. Look at errors_css.log'; exit 0;
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run build && cd $npm_package_config_theme_path && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path -w scss scss/ -o css/
